00067  static bool IsWinZipAesEncryption(int iEncryptionMethod)
00068  {
00069   return iEncryptionMethod == encWinZipAes128 || iEncryptionMethod == encWinZipAes192 || iEncryptionMethod == encWinZipAes256;
00070  }
00071 
00081  static bool IsEncryptionSupported(int iEncryptionMethod)
00082  {  
00083 #ifdef _ZIP_AES
00084   return IsWinZipAesEncryption(iEncryptionMethod) || iEncryptionMethod == encStandard;
00085 #else
00086   return iEncryptionMethod == encStandard;
00087 #endif
00088  }
